name: Single bit
Dec
Hex
Multiple bits
Dec
Hex
FC{1,2}
func:
var uri = "http://web:8080/api/mb/tcp/fc/",
    fc = msg.payload,
    ip = "slave",
    port = 502,
    slave = 1,
    addr = 10,
    len = 4;

msg.url = uri + fc + 
    "?ip=" + ip + 
    "&port=" + port +
    "&slave="+ slave +
    "&addr=" + addr + 
    "&len=" + len;
return msg;

name: FC{3,4} - Register
func:
var uri = "http://web:8080/api/mb/tcp/fc/",
    fc    = msg.payload,
    ip = "slave",
    port = 502,
    slave = 1,
    addr = 10,
    len = 10,
    type = 1;

msg.url = uri+ fc    + 
    "?ip="   + ip    + 
    "&port=" + port  +
    "&slave="+ slave +
    "&addr=" + addr  + 
    "&len="  + len   +
    "&type=" + type;

return msg;

name: FC{3,4} - Scale
func:
var uri   = "http://web:8080/api/mb/tcp/fc/",
    fc    = msg.payload,
    ip    = "slave",
    port  = 502,
    slave = 1,
    addr  = 3,
    len   = 4,
    type  = 3,
    a     = 0,
    b     = 65535,
    c     = 100,
    d     = 500;

msg.url = uri+ fc    + 
    "?ip="   + ip    + 
    "&port=" + port  +
    "&slave="+ slave +
    "&addr=" + addr  + 
    "&len="  + len   +
    "&type=" + type  +
    "&a="    + a     +
    "&b="    + b     +
    "&c="    + c     +
    "&d="    + d     ;

return msg;

name: FC{3,4} - 16bit (AB)
func:
var uri   = "http://web:8080/api/mb/tcp/fc/",
    fc    = msg.payload,
    ip    = "slave",
    port  = 502,
    slave = 1,
    addr  = 3,
    len   = 4,
    type  = 4,
    order = 1;

msg.url = uri+ fc    + 
    "?ip="   + ip    + 
    "&port=" + port  +
    "&slave="+ slave +
    "&addr=" + addr  + 
    "&len="  + len   +
    "&type=" + type  +
    "&order="+ order ;


return msg;

func:
var uri   = "http://web:8080/api/mb/tcp/fc/",

return msg;
